dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2345 IH: To extend the date after which interest earned on obligations held in the wildlife restoration fund may be available for apportionment.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Wittman (for himself and Mr. Thompson of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the date after which interest earned on obligations held in the wildlife restoration fund may be available for apportionment.

section.header: Interest on obligations held in the wildlife restoration fund
section.text: Section 3(b)(2)(C) of the Pittman-Robertson Wildlife Restoration Act (16 U.S.C. 669b(b)(2)(C)) is amended by striking 2016 and inserting 2026.
